name: RemoveCellsFromTable
description:
Remove cells from a specified Native Ramp table.

Use this tool to remove specific cells from a Native Ramp table. It should be called when there is a need to delete data within the rows of the specified table.

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: The name of the Native Ramp table from which cells will be removed. This should be a string matching the table's identifier.

parameters.name: cells_to_remove_request
parameters.description: JSON object containing data about the cells to remove, structured with rows and cell details.

cells.description: The contents of the cells in the row. The column name should be the name of the column, and the contents should be the value to insert into the cell. When setting a cell to reference many rows, each reference must be a separate entry in the list.

row.description: An identifier for the Ramp object

data.description: List of rows to insert or update. All entries must have the same set of column names, with `null` provided to indicate that a value should not be set.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

cells.description: The contents of the cells in the row. The column name should be the name of the column, and the contents should be the value to insert into the cell. When setting a cell to reference many rows, each reference must be a separate entry in the list.

row.description: An identifier for the Ramp object

data.description: List of rows to insert or update. All entries must have the same set of column names, with `null` provided to indicate that a value should not be set.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
